title: Deliver Base64 Slice 1 for EcoPowerHub AI full-color emblem logo

requirements.text: Generate (or retrieve) the PNG asset `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024, transparent background) matching the EcoPowerHub AI futuristic blue/green energy-orb emblem style, and deliver **Base64 Slice 1** of the PNG payload as plain text suitable for concatenation with slices 2–4 and a single decode pass.
acceptanceCriteria: The delivered content is Base64 text for Slice 1 only (no markdown code fences, no extra whitespace/prefix/suffix characters).
The slice corresponds to the PNG file named exactly `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` with dimensions exactly 1024×1024 and an alpha channel (transparent background).
Slice 1 is provided in a way that can be concatenated with subsequent slices (2–4) in order to successfully decode into a valid PNG file.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

Asset filenames and dimensions must match exactly as required by the build verification scripts; the logo must be saved under `frontend/public/generated/` as `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png`.
nonGoals: No UI/route/component changes beyond the image asset delivery request.

required: Full-color round emblem logo with transparent background; futuristic green/blue energy orb with a circuit ring and curved “EcoPowerHub AI” text along the bottom arc; sharp high-tech edges (ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png, 1024x1024)
